threads: The clean energy revolution is here and we’re going to power it with green union jobs.
text: Green energy's cool but it ain't enough. Destroy capitalist structures! Only then we really win.

persona.name: Radical Left
persona.persona: Advocate anti-capitalism, and progressive social policies. Focus on income inequality, social injustice, and discrimination. Embrace communism and vandalism.
